articles.title: SIX INDUSTRIES CRYING OUT FOR HELP AND LIKELY TO COLLAPSE
articles.text: As the coronavirus pandemic continues, more and more sectors of the economy are likely to go bankrupt.
articles.read:
As the coronavirus pandemic continues, more and more sectors of the economy are likely to go bankrupt.

       With banks under fire for denying emergency loans to all firms, demonstrations against the the UK's government lack of direct intervention have commenced.

      The list covers big chunks of the country's infrastructure and vital transport links, but also other, less obvious economic areas that are no less important to society.

      All industries have one thing in common: theyâ€™re crying out for help and fear that the coronavirus crisis is likely to inflict lasting damage.
